io.spine.server.event

Class InvalidEventException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • io.spine.server.event.EventException
            • io.spine.server.event.InvalidEventException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InvalidEventException
extends EventException
    The exception for reporting invalid events.

    An event is invalid if it's supported (there's a handler for the event), but its attributes are not populated according to framework conventions or validation constraints.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
